alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 4:16PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nez Perce and northern Lewis Counties through 345 PM PDT... At 316 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Juliaetta, or 13 miles west of Orofino, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Peck, Lenore, and Gifford. This includes U.S. Highway 12 in Idaho between mile markers 23 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
